response.original_title: Isaac Hecker and the Journey of Catholic America
response.overview: Isaac Hecker's story is ultimately an American story about someone who not only spent his life trying to experience God acting in the world, but who also tried to build bridges so others could join him on that journey. No matter what one's religious background might be, Isaac Hecker and the Journey of Catholic America is a story for all spiritual seekers about someone whose life continues to impact our society today.
response.title: Isaac Hecker and the Journey of Catholic America
